basics.name: Homero Cabrera Araque
basics.label: Software Developer | .NET | MCP | C# | Python | SQL | ReactJS | JavaScript | RPA | AI | Django | API | Docker | Power Apps
basics.summary: I am a Full Stack Developer passionate about automation and technological innovation. I have strong experience in ReactJS, Django REST API, Jenkins, Docker, C#, PHP, Python, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I am committed to delivering robust and effective solutions in challenging environments. My enthusiasm for agile development and continuous improvement is complemented by my ability to integrate cutting-edge technologies, such as automation, OpenAI APIs, and continuous integration through GIT and GitHub. I have worked on various projects, applying solid principles of object-oriented programming (OOP) and MVC design patterns, which has strengthened my ability to deliver high-quality, results-oriented software. My focus goes beyond programming. In essence, I seek to create transformative solutions that drive business success and enhance user experience. As a passionate advocate for technical excellence and cutting-edge technology, I am prepared to face the current and future challenges in the software development world.

work.name: VidaMia

work.name: AZTECA INTERNACIONAL INC

Developed automation solutions to optimize business processes and integrated the ChatGPT API to enhance system functionality and user interactions. Focused on improving efficiency, scalability, and AI-driven automation in Bogotá, Distrito Capital, Colombia.

Focused on improving efficiency, reducing manual tasks, and enhancing cross-country workflow automation in Bogotá, Distrito Capital, Colombia.
